level.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA CLEAN RIVERS IMPERVIOUS SURFACE AREA CHARGE INCENTIVEISCOUNT PROGRAM[COLON] DISCOUNT REDUCTION (§ 21-4108)

level.text: 4108.1 If DDOE determines that a customer’s stormwater fee discount shall beeduced, DC Water shall reduce the IAC Incentive Discount proportionately uponeceipt of DDOE’s decision to reduce the stormwater retention value expressedn ERUs for the property.
